name: Polygon Parenting RPG Test1
description:
This is my first RPG game I made.

The goal is to defeat all the white enemies by simply touching them and finishing as quick as possible. You run slightly faster than them, so you can catch them if they run away. Once you defeat all of the enemies, you can press the switch at the end of the level and then you need to escape and head back through the door at the beginning of the level to win and see your final time.

Music and sounds are from Pizza Tower and Rayman.
